generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A paved area alongside the road, separated by a curb and bordered by a stone wall, is visible on the right side, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: Multi-story residential buildings are visible on both sides of the street, fitting the definition of buildings.
- wall: A stone wall runs along the right side of the sidewalk, which is an individual standing wall.
- fence: The stone wall along the sidewalk can also be considered a fence, as it serves to delimit the sidewalk from the adjacent area.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging above the road, and another is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue and white traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible along the sidewalk and at the edges of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing as an open sky.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible parked on the left side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible being ridden by a person on the right side of the road.
